news_header: Learn to distinguish between fake and real videos as AI tools evolve.
news_text: This text discusses the advancements in artificial intelligence tools that allow almost anyone to create credible videos. While this technology opens new opportunities, it also poses threats, such as the risk of being deceived by fake videos that look real. Notable examples include a false video of Kamala Harris released by Elon Musk and fake content involving pop star S Swift. The text encourages readers to test their ability to differentiate between real and fake videos and invites them to share their stories via email.
